| logo = | logosize = }} The '''Living Waters Christian Assembly''' is a [[Pentecostal]] [[Church (building)|church]], serving the West End of [[Ottawa, Ontario]]. Until November 2004 it was named '''The Westend Church'''. Started in approximately 1995 by The Life Centre, the Westend Church moved from a renovated warehouse on Woodward Drive in [[Carlington]], to the Fisher Park High School auditorium in [[Ottawa West]], finally to their own building on Slack Road near Merivale Rd. The church also presents an annual Easter drama, ''The Crucifixion'', which has been performed every year since 1985. ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == {{Commons}} * [http://www.livingwaterschristianassembly.org Living Waters Christian Assembly website] {{Coord|45.3231|-75.7279|region:CA-ON_type:landmark|display=title}} [[Category:Churches in Ottawa|Westend]] {{ottawa-stub}}
